scripts.build: rimraf -rf lib esm dist type-artefacts && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd && npm run build:types
scripts.build:types: npm run build:types-vue3 && rimraf type-artefacts/**/*.js type-artefacts/**/**/*.js
scripts.build:types-vue3: npx vue-demi-switch 3 vue3 && tsc --project tsconfig.types.json --outDir type-artefacts/v3 && tsc --project tsconfig.types.json --outDir type-artefacts/cur
